text_logic_form: The line segment $AB$ is the diameter of the circle $D$.
The length of the line segment $AC$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line segment $BC$ is $15$ units.
Find the radius of the circle $D$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line segment $AB$ is the diameter of the circle $D$.
The length of the line segment $AC$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line segment $BC$ is $15$ units.
Find the radius of the circle $D$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $D$ lies on the line segment $BA$.
Point $B$ lies on the circle $D$ with a radius of $r$.
Point $A$ lies on the circle $D$ with a radius of $r$.
Point $C$ lies on the circle $D$ with a radius of $r$.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $BA$, and $BC$ forming a triangle $ABC$.
The line segment $DA$ is a diameter of the circle $D$.
The line segment $DB$ is a diameter of the circle $D$.
circle_instances: There is a circle $D$ with a center at point $D$ and a radius of $r$.
